name: Cowboy Hero Shooter DX (WIP/Playable demo available)
name_original: Cowboy Hero Shooter DX (WIP/Playable demo available)
description:
Steven is back in the reimaged and remastered adventure from the original Cowboy Hero Shooter: The New Adventures! game!

Smooth 60fps gameplay, animated cutscenes, and a newly rearranged soundtrack!

New minigames mode brings back the old can shooting game, with 2 NEW minigames coming through!

Challenge every Jeff battle and reach the fastest time with online ranking in Boss Rush Mode!*

Bring back the old memories with the classic soundtrack feature!

* Internet connection required for online ranking
